attributes.action: acknowledge the duties of Government ministers towards the Sovereign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister, as First Servant of the Crown should at all times remember that he is empowered by the Sovereign to assume the powers of goverment for the time being. He should also ensure that other Ministers of the Crown at all times keep the Sovereign informed of all activites which pertain to their ministerial positions. The Prime Minister should further acknowledge his primary duty to serve the Sovereign and protect the said Sovereign from acts of disloyalty, discourtesy and disrespect.
